name: Journey to the Rift
description:
The exciting demo version of Journey to the Rift! Includes the first four floors of a mysterious dungeon to be explored. Uncover secrets, build your base camp, and make your way through the first four thrilling floors in Journey to the Rift!

Journey to the Rift is a text-based dungeon crawler with a focus on a wide selection of possible encounters, randomly generated to make each adventure feel fresh. Build your own base-camp and delve into the depths of a mysterious dungeon, with a strange history to uncover and even stranger residents to meet, greet, and fight!
